    • Uses of DataAccessException in fr.epita.quiz.exception

      Subclasses of DataAccessException in fr.epita.quiz.exception 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CreateFailedException
      The CreateFailedException is thrown when there is an error writing to the database
      class  DeleteFailedException
      The DeleteFailedException is thrown when a problem occurs in deleting records in the database
      class  ReadFailedException
      The ReadFailedException is thrown when a problem occurs to fetch data from the database
      class  SearchFailedException
      The SearchFailedException is thrown when a problem occurs in searching based on a criterion in the database
      class  UpdateFailedException
      The UpdateFailedException is thrown when a problem occurs in updating a record in the database
